name: Flappy Vity
description:
" -Gravity is playing with you, be careful ! Go go go little bird, flap as far as you can ! - "

This is the intro of Flappy Vity. This game is absolutely not inspired by Flappy Bird.  This this is a work of fiction. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental. See ?

My first game ever,  hope you enjoy <3  share you best score !
